text:
[Verse]
Walking down the empty street
Shadows dancing by my feet
Moonlight whispers in the night
Stars are shining oh so bright

[Verse 2]
Chasing dreams in midnight air
Life is moving without care
Lost in moments pure and sweet
Heartbeat keeping perfect beat

[Chorus]
Chasing shadows in the dark night
Running
Flying
Out of sight
Feel the magic in the clear sky
Never asking reasons why

[Verse 3]
Echoes of a distant song
Pulling me where I belong
In the silence
In the breeze
Whispers hidden in the trees

[Bridge]
Floating like a lost balloon
Rising up to touch the moon
Holding on to what I know
Never letting shadows go

[Chorus]
Chasing shadows in the dark night
Running
Flying
Out of sight
Feel the magic in the clear sky
Never asking reasons why
title: Chasing Shadows
